00030         class TaskReader

00034                 std::map<std::string, std::string> d_data;

00037 
00038                 public:
00039                         /* Public functions */
00040                         TaskReader();
00041                         TaskReader(std::istream &stream);
00042 
00043                         messages::task::Task &Task();
00044

00046                         virtual bool Setting(std::string const &key) const;
00047 
00048                         virtual bool Data(std::string const &key, std::string &value) const;
00049                         virtual bool Data(std::string const &key) const;
00050 
00051                         virtual bool Parameter(std::string const &name, messages::task::Task::Parameter &parameter) const;

00054

00056

00061                 private:
